name: part_009
file: tmp_いつか吾輩もあの頃のインターネットって言われる日が来るのかな #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 [m8hqs4NMij4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'シュガーソングとビターステップ' (Sugar Song to Bitter Step).
scenes.song_name: シュガーソングとビターステップ

scenes.description: A man shares his thoughts on La+ Darknesss and her new song announcement.
Performance of the song 'バグラブ' (Bug Love).

subtitles.original: 死のその後で
subtitles.english: After death

subtitles.original: 高鳴り出す人が　泣き出してしまう人が
subtitles.english: People who get excited, people who start crying

subtitles.original: 多分同じだろう
subtitles.english: They're probably the same

subtitles.original: でも言葉にしようものなら
subtitles.english: But if you were to put it into words

subtitles.original: 稚拙が極まれり
subtitles.english: It would be the height of clumsiness

subtitles.original: 最高だって、シュガーソング　幸せだって、ビターステップ
subtitles.english: It's the best, sugar song. It's happiness, bitter step.

subtitles.original: 死ねない理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Project the reasons you can't die right there

subtitles.original: おしげなく、こそばゆくて、明日はくちゃげど
subtitles.english: Without hesitation, it's ticklish, even if tomorrow is a mess

subtitles.original: 脳内天気予報のアップデートを果たしたなら
subtitles.english: Once you've updated your internal weather forecast

subtitles.original: Someday 狂騒外、気を逸らしても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if you turn your eyes away from the frenzy

subtitles.original: Someday 0、2、右が見えなくなっても
subtitles.english: Someday, even if you can no longer see zero, two, or the right

subtitles.original: 平気だって鳴らし続けることだけが
subtitles.english: Just continuing to ring out that everything's okay

subtitles.original: 僕たちを僕たちたらしめる証明になるQED
subtitles.english: Will be the proof that makes us who we are, Q.E.D.

subtitles.original: マバレだって、シュガーソング　生きてく理由をそこに映し出せ
subtitles.english: Even if it's dizzying, sugar song. Project the reasons you live right there.

subtitles.original: ほくほくと、ほほえむ、その距離はおかし、世界中を驚かせ続けよう
subtitles.english: Smiling warmly, that distance is strange, let's keep surprising the whole world.

subtitles.original: マバレだって、シュガーソング　ピーナッツ＆ビターステップ、甘くて苦くて目が回りそうです
subtitles.english: Even if it's dizzying, sugar song. Peanuts & bitter step, it's so sweet and bitter that I feel dizzy.

subtitles.original: 南南西を目指してパーティを続けよう、世界中を驚かせてしまう夜になれ
subtitles.english: Let's keep the party going towards the south-southwest, let it be a night that surprises the whole world.

subtitles.original: I feel 頂上現象になっていくよ、サッテ、イチナンサッテマタイッキョ
subtitles.english: I feel it's becoming a peak phenomenon, now, one trouble follows another.

subtitles.original: サッテ、イチナンサッテマタイッキョ
subtitles.english: Now, one trouble follows another.

subtitles.original: You got the happiness, phrase and the melody.
subtitles.english: You got the happiness, phrase and the melody.

subtitles.original: え、ラプラス・ダークネスってオリ曲3曲しかないの？
subtitles.english: Wait, La+ Darkness only has three original songs?

subtitles.original: やっぱ、期待しちゃダメじゃない？新曲なんて出すわけないんだから
subtitles.english: I knew it, we shouldn't get our hopes up. There's no way she's releasing a new song.

subtitles.original: ラプラス・ダークネスなんて当てにしちゃダメだよ。ん。
subtitles.english: You can't rely on someone like La+ Darkness. Yeah.

subtitles.original: え、新曲出るの？
subtitles.english: What, a new song is coming out?

subtitles.original: しかもDECO*27さんなの！？
subtitles.english: And it's by DECO*27?!

subtitles.original: タイトル？
subtitles.english: The title?

subtitles.original: 「バグラブ」？
subtitles.english: “Bug Love”?

subtitles.original: それって・・・つまり自己防衛？
subtitles.english: Does that... mean self-defense?

subtitles.original: この後披露するの？
subtitles.english: Is she performing it after this?

subtitles.original: これ見ないとダメじゃない？ん。
subtitles.english: We have to watch this, don't we? Yeah.

subtitles.original: この後見逃しちゃダメだよ。ん。
subtitles.english: Don't miss what's coming next. Yeah.

subtitles.original: つまり自己防衛？
subtitles.english: So, self-defense?

subtitles.original: ん。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: やっぱりラプレスハッピーじゃん
subtitles.english: It's La+ Happy after all.

subtitles.original: あーまさか これってまさか 好きってやつか どんなんか知らないけど
subtitles.english: Oh, could it be? Is this "love"? I don't know what it's like, but...

subtitles.original: はてなって火花 バチってなるの 鈍感でいられたらなあ
subtitles.english: Sparks of question marks go pop! I wish I could just stay oblivious.

subtitles.original: あーこんなはずじゃ とんだ恥じゃ 残念の始まりじゃ
subtitles.english: Oh, it wasn't supposed to be like this. What a total embarrassment. It's the beginning of the end.

subtitles.original: あーとんでも事案 ハートの治安 曖昧でお仕舞いじゃん
subtitles.english: Oh, what a crazy situation. The peace of my heart is gone. It's all over with this ambiguity.

subtitles.original: 気になって 気にしないとこ 気になるとこ
subtitles.english: I'm curious. The things I try not to care about, the things I end up caring about.

subtitles.original: 気まずくて きみやむじゃない
subtitles.english: It's awkward. You're not going to stop, are you?

subtitles.original: バグってるラブ あたしなんですか？やだよがっかりラブ デビューベイビーじゃん
subtitles.english: Bugged love, is it me? No way, it's a disappointing love debut, baby.

subtitles.original: 痛だけの気持ち 最悪の見込み 好きって認めなね
subtitles.english: Just painful feelings, the worst outlook. Don't admit you like it.

subtitles.original: バグってるラブ あたしなんかじゃない そうだやっぱりラプレスハッピーじゃん
subtitles.english: Bugged love, it's not me. That's right, it's La+ Happy after all.

subtitles.original: 期待なんてなしな あっちけバリア 好きってならないでねの
subtitles.english: Don't have any expectations. Go away, barrier! Don't fall in love, okay?

subtitles.original: 距離感です
subtitles.english: It's the distance.

subtitles.original: 正直あたしは終わった 何しようがどうも モヤモヤが消えない
subtitles.english: Honestly, I'm done. No matter what I do, this feeling won't go away.

subtitles.original: 呆然ただ笑った いつも通りロンリー 息をしたいのに
subtitles.english: I just laughed in a daze. Lonely as always, even though I want to breathe.

subtitles.original: 意地張っていじけるとかいじらしいから
subtitles.english: Being stubborn and sulking is so pathetic.

subtitles.original: 恋って冗談じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't love just a joke?
